ActSpecial Retirement Arrangements Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the RETIREMENT COMPENSATION ARRANGEMENTS REGULATIONS, NO. 1 by providing for the revocation of a transfer value benefit option on the basis of erroneous or misleading advice and the automatic revocation of that option where an individual again becomes a contributor before the benefit is paid, and by allowing for the reinstatement of prior service for which a transfer value benefit was paid.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2003-0012 Publication Date: 2003-01-01
